scripts.dev: node scripts/try-docker.js && concurrently -n "SHARED,CLIENT,API" -c "bgYellow.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "pnpm --filter @kds/shared dev" "pnpm --filter client dev" "pnpm --filter api start:dev"
scripts.build:prod: pnpm --filter @kds/shared build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter client build
scripts.prod: pnpm run build:prod && concurrently -n "CLIENT,API" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "pnpm --filter client start" "pnpm --filter api start:prod"
